alert.note: Alert for North Cass; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:40PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Itasca and northwestern Cass Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 739 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Laporte, or 13 miles north of Walker, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Winnibigoshish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
